buffalo3d.vos

Class Ray

  • java.lang.Object
    • buffalo3d.vos.Ray

  • public class Ray
extends Object
    Represents a geometric ray, compound of a Number3d.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ray(float vec_x, float vec_y, float vec_z)
      Constructs a ray from a point and a vector.
      Ray(Number3d v)
      Constructs a ray from a point and a vector.
      Ray(Number3d p, Number3d v)
      Constructs a ray from a point and a vector

      Returns the starting point for this ray

      Returns the point in the ray that corresponds to the given t parameter

      Returns the vector defining the ray

        Constructs a ray from a point and a vector

      • Ray

        public Ray(Number3d v)
        Constructs a ray from a point and a vector. The point is defined as (0,0,0)
        Parameters:
        v - the vector

      • Ray

        public Ray(float vec_x,
           float vec_y,
           float vec_z)
        Constructs a ray from a point and a vector. The point is defined as (0,0,0)
        Parameters:
        vec_x - x in the vector
        vec_y - y in the vector
        vec_z - z in the vector
